title: New: How To Dress Well – & It Was U
body:
I’m fairly sure that I want **Tom Krell** to sing at my wedding… or funeral… whichever comes first.

With his debut LP **_Love Remains_** still a regular on my evening playlists, upcoming sophomore record _**Total Loss**_ is shaping up rather nicely. New cut & _It Was U_ (premiered via [NPR](http://www.npr.org/blogs/allsongs/2012/09/04/160573767/song-premiere-how-to-dress-well-it-was-u)) has more than a whiff of Prince about it; slick, funky and unashamedly pop. It may not be especially complicated nor technical, but there are few around doing this better than Krell is.

[How To Dress Well – & It Was U](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/20120905_blog_itwasu.mp3)
